Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Necropsy of the first case revealed loss of myelination and necrosis of the white matter .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| loss of myelination |
| necrosis of the white matter |

Note: While "loss of myelination" and "necrosis of the white matter" are not diseases themselves, they are common pathological findings in various diseases. I have included them as they are the "Disease" entities mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Paragraph: Necropsy of the first case revealed loss of myelination and necrosis of the white matter .

| Chemical |
| --- |
| myelination |

Note: In the given paragraph, the term "myelination" is the only term that can be considered a "chemical" entity, although it is not a chemical substance but rather a biological process involving the coating of nerve fibers with a myelin sheath.
